title: 怎么黏贴复制东西在游戏里啊
txt_content: 我要搞代码 不会复制 谁教我啊 像这个http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-58502-1-1.html 里面就有复制啊

replies.author: zhjjhz
replies.txt_content:
mc支持Ctrl+c\v
复制后打开游戏
点击框框
安Ctrl+v
就可以了
望采纳
种子也是一样的哦！

replies.author: BensonQC
replies.txt_content:
Ctrl+A全选
Ctrl+c复制
Ctrl+v粘帖

replies.author: xxzzyyzzxx
replies.txt_content: 按shift+←→键选中文字，Ctrl+x/c/v剪切复制粘贴
